item.title: Litter at J11 of M5. Really bad!, 23rd January
item.description:
There is a really increase in litter on the approach to Junc 11 of the M5 joining on the approach from Gloucester. All the grassed areas are awash with it. Would be great to see it clean and maintained. Thank you. Gloucester resident
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Golden Valley Junction, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole at top end of Shelburne Road, 23rd January
item.description:
Just as you turn left from lansdown Road there is an area of repaired road at the bus stop on the left. A pothole has appeared where the repair has failed revealing a sharp difference in height.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shelburne Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole in carriageway nr 27 Gretton Road Winchcombe, 23rd January
item.description:
In the carriageway (Gretton Road) and very obvious. Due to parking this is effectively the side of the road that carries all the traffic and it's enlarged by around 50% in just a week. It is the top layer of tarmac being compromised, exposing the lower layer.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 41, Gretton Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There are several pot holes between House on the Green and Brook Cottage which are extremely dangerous to the elderly, 23rd January
